WeaponTraitDef.label: flechettes
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires pointed, fin-stabilized steel projectiles.

WeaponTraitDef.label: mini-rockets
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires dangerous mini-rockets with an explosive payload. Less damaging than bullets, but affecting a greater area.

WeaponTraitDef.label: sonic amplifier
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of bullets, this gun fires bursts of compressed sound, causing blunt damage.

WeaponTraitDef.label: cryo rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires ammunition that contains cryogenic chemicals. It will cause frostbite.

WeaponTraitDef.label: fertilizer canisters
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires fertilizer canisters that will turn soil into tilled soil.

WeaponTraitDef.label: corrosive burst
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires a pressurized blast of corrosive acid that deals increased damage to armor.

WeaponTraitDef.label: potato cannon
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires... potatoes... Not very useful offensively, but it is a great way to, well, plant potatoes. Note that potatoes need terrain with more than 70% fertility.

WeaponTraitDef.label: incendiary launcher
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires incendiary canisters.

WeaponTraitDef.label: EMP launcher
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires EMP canisters.

WeaponTraitDef.label: toxbomb launcher
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires toxic gas canisters.

WeaponTraitDef.label: flamethrower
WeaponTraitDef.description: This launcher ignites its incendiary shells as soon as they leave the gun, releasing a huge cone of fire that burns everything in its path.

WeaponTraitDef.label: laser capacitor
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of bullets, this gun fires laser shots.

WeaponTraitDef.label: coil lance conversion
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of bullets or charge shots, this sniper has been modified to electromagnetically accelerate piercing metal shards to enormous speeds. These will pierce through enemies.

WeaponTraitDef.label: acidic repeater
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of gamma ray laser bursts, this repeater will produce a bunch of extremely dangerous acidic blasts.

WeaponTraitDef.label: cryo cannon
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of gamma ray laser bursts, this repeater will fire a single frost ray that will damage everything on its path.

WeaponTraitDef.label: plasma cannon
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of gamma ray laser bursts, this repeater will fire a single plasma ray that will damage everything on its path.

WeaponTraitDef.label: chakram launcher
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of bullets, this sniper fires extremely dangerous plasteel chakram that propel themselves via nano-skip fields. These chakram have extremely high armor penetration and deal gruesome cuts.

WeaponTraitDef.label: thermal blasts
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of bullets, this gun fires concentrated thermal blasts that cause instant heatstroke in its targets. Useless against non-flammable enemies such as mechanoids.

WeaponTraitDef.label: vanometric 3D printer
WeaponTraitDef.description: A very rare archotech device that allows the weapon to work without the need for either ammunition or any power source. It seems to be very ancient tech and is malfunctioning, causing the weapon to produce random results every time it is fired.\n\nThis will either annihilate its target, or cause unbound chaos.

WeaponTraitDef.label: needle projectiles
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of bullets, this weapon will fire a rapid burst of small needles, coated with a paralytic poison.

WeaponTraitDef.label: tesla coil
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of charge shots, this rifle can fire a cascade of chaining electromagnetic energy that can stun and disable mechanoids, while at the same time unleashing energy that can burn through organic targets.

WeaponTraitDef.label: nerve spiker
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon has been modified with a crossbow-like device that throws rough spikes embedded with a paralytic biotoxin.

WeaponTraitDef.label: thumper rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of pellets, this shotgun fires breaching explosive concussions bombs that are extremely effective against walls and structures, but do much less damage to small targets.

WeaponTraitDef.label: net gun
WeaponTraitDef.description: This launcher fires tangled nets to entangle and immobilize targets.\n\n-Negates the forced miss radius of this weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: syringer gun
WeaponTraitDef.description: This rifle has been modified to fire mutagenic syringes that can cause random harmful mutations on their targets.

WeaponTraitDef.label: shatter rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires shatter rounds that will create shrapnel upon impact.

WeaponTraitDef.label: shatter pellets
WeaponTraitDef.description: Instead of regular pellets, this shotgun fires shatter pellets that will create shrapnel upon impact.

WeaponTraitDef.label: electrified
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires microscopic mechanite charges that cause a bolt of lightning to impact their targets.

WeaponTraitDef.label: tachyonic feed
WeaponTraitDef.description: Projectiles fired by this weapon will cause increased, scaling damage on moving targets.

WeaponTraitDef.label: hemovoric
WeaponTraitDef.description: Projectiles fired by this weapon will drain blood from their target and attempt to transfer it to the shooter. Which is obviously quite useless unless the shooter is a Sanguophage!

WeaponTraitDef.label: psychic
WeaponTraitDef.description: Projectiles fired by this weapon will absorb life power from their target and attempt to transfer it in the form of psyfocus to the shooter. Which is obviously quite useless unless the shooter is a psycaster!

WeaponTraitDef.label: bullet splitting
WeaponTraitDef.description: Projectiles fired by this weapon will be duplicated at half strength.

WeaponTraitDef.label: healing gun
WeaponTraitDef.description: This minigun fires mechanite needles filled with a powerful healing serum. They will heal their targets instead of harming them.

WeaponTraitDef.label: lifesteal
WeaponTraitDef.description: Projectiles fired by this weapon will drain health from their target and transfer it back to the wielder.

WeaponTraitDef.label: chemburster
WeaponTraitDef.description: Bullets fired from this weapon have a microscopic ampoule of concentrated chemfuel. This will be injected into their targets and cause them to explode on death.

WeaponTraitDef.label: flux-charged
WeaponTraitDef.description: Projectiles fired by this weapon will imbue their target with flux damage. Flux damage destabilizes a target’s bioelectric field, causing a short-range energy discharge that harms nearby creatures.

WeaponTraitDef.label: voltaic rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon fires rounds with a stored electrical charge, which will paralize and cause heart attacks in targets.

WeaponTraitDef.label: target locator
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon will do almost no damage, but will inject its target with a nano-beacon that will make other guns impact much harder.

WeaponTraitDef.label: repair gun
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon will do no damage, and will instead repair buildings it is fired at.

WeaponTraitDef.label: bee-bee gun
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon will fire bees instead of bullets. Ok...

WeaponTraitDef.label: bubble burster
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon will fire a burst of short range acidic bubbles.

WeaponTraitDef.label: entropy rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: Projectiles fired by this weapon will convert their wielder's neural heat into extra psychic damage. Every shot that hits will reduce this heat by 1.
